Key Match Events: GRAND SLAM HOME RUN! Dodgers 2-5 Yankees, bottom 3rd
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees shortstop Anthony Volpe hits a grand slam against the Dodgers in the third inning during Game 4 of the World Series.
The Yankees keep World Series alive as bats awaken for Game 4 win over Dodgers.
So the Yankees do what they need to do, play a good game of baseball, score some runs and get a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Volpe hits a grand slam against the Dodgers in the third inning
Judge steals second and scores on an RBI hit
Austin Wells hits a home run in the sixth inning
Dodgers' pitcher Luke Weaver is down for the second out
Dodgers' pitcher Mark Leiter Jr. strikes out Will Smith
